title: My firefox web browser is no longer working.  Every time I try to search the internet I get an error message that says "cannot connect to the server."
content: I use Firefox as my default web browser on my Apple computer. I have many bookmarks, links and school related material that I can no longer access because an error message says that it cannot connect to the Firefox server. Please help. I'm a teacher and I can not get to my student material. I can not conduct any searches or click any links.
creator: swedeej

title: fullscreen not working on 2021 14 macbook pro
content: Whenever I go into fullscreen on my 14 inch macbook pro, it creates large bezels around the video instead of going all the way up to the end of the screen
creator: oliver.lokhandwala

title: Download Progress dropdown list keeps coming up
content: Firefox did an update today, so I assume this has something to do with it. Every time I do a download (and I do a lot) the drop down list showing the downloads I've done pops out. It didn't do this prior to the update. It used only to appear when I selected it. Now it comes out every blasted time. It's very annoying and distracting. To be clear, I still want to see the download arrow/indicator/whatever so I can see the download is happening, but I don't want to see the list each time. How do I make it STOP? Image attached. Thank you.
creator: rorfordak

title: Gmail
content: Hello. Is there a way to tell if someone who knows your gmail address can read your sent email or received email messages? Thankyou.
creator: cs999

title: Removal of bookmarks that Remove Bookmarks leaves listed and are not eliminated from browser and are still live.
content: Tell me how to get rid of these unwanted URLS from my system. They pose a security risk. One link Regal Henrietta is one that was closed 2 years ago. I have been trying to clean unneeded bookmarks in my Firefox for the Mac on my iMac vintage late 2013.
creator: ddmeisel

title: Downloads going automatically to Download file - even after changing all to Ask Me
content: After the automatic update to version 98, I'm finding that Firefox insists on putting a copy of my downloaded files into the Download file even after I turned that off in the General tab of Settings. Also found it odd that I was unable to take a screenshot of these settings, but had to use Printscreen to do so!
creator: bmogrady

title: Pinned tabs are not opened again
content:
Hello Please I need urgent help for pinned tabs Every time I pin the tabs I close the browser and open it again I will lose my pinned tabs I tried to restore the session but the option is disabled in the history I'm not facing this issue in another browsers like Safari, but I always prefer Firefox and actually can not migrate to any other browser, Firefox is my friend since 2000 So please can you help me to resolve this and give me advice, it is a quite important feature for me


With Regards
creator: hassanjamilahj

title: Downloads panel automatically opens
content:
Hello there,

Is there a way to turn off the Downloads panel automatically opens feature? Thank you very much.
creator: adamisabum

title: Constant New Logins
content: My FireFox makes me login to my social media accounts, emails, and all other accounts every time I login. Is there a way to have Firefox remember my logins so I don't have to re-sign in every time? I have already checked that my passwords are saved.
creator: chine.love15

title: The download progress window opens every single time I download a file. How do I stop this?
content: Every single time I download a file, the download progress window opens itself. This is really distracting and annoying. It just started this afternoon. Closing and reopening Firefox does not fix the problem.
creator: AlexReyanrd

title: Homepage randomly switches to MSN?
content:
I have noticed recently that every week or so my Firefox browser will randomly change my homepage directory to the landing page / search for MSN, which is baffling, since it is obtrusive and anti-Mozilla to me.

If y'all are sneaking it in for that sweet ad revenue, I understand, but I would donate to avoid this issue.

Otherwise Firefox / Thunderbird are awesome, and I appreciate all that you do!

Cheers, Elliot
creator: deanel018

title: Minimize, Restore and Close buttons not visible during Gmail page but occasionally
content: I have strange issue. I cannot see Minimise, Restore and Close button on my Gmail page many times. Not happening always but many times. Attached the screenshot for your ref. I use Win7 at home and Win 10 at the work, both places have the same problem. Both FF browsers are Synced. Even I cannot see those buttons when I click at those places it responds accordingly. So I guess there is some button visualization problem. Please help. Thank you. Darshan.
creator: dpparmar
